name: Evil Tomato
description:
Submission to weeks 130 "Death is awarded".

You are a tomato that can possess other vegetables. Make sure you get to the goal, at any cost.

Art done by Yoolwocle

Gameplay Implemented by Daryoush "Dare" Farsimadan and Gonzako

Intro theme by Spad3s

Sound effects by Jonchomosky

Thanks to https://mastorak.itch.io/ and https://raventale.itch.io/ for their contributions to the open game assets
